benefits.headline: Eliminate time fraud and reduce payroll costs by up to 5%
benefits.description: Biometric authentication and real-time tracking prevent buddy punching, ghost employees, and time theft. Automated detection of irregularities and unauthorized entries ensures you only pay for actual hours worked.
proof_points: Time fraud can cost businesses up to 5% of gross payroll
29% of all businesses are affected by ghost employee fraud
Reduce time tracking errors by 30% on average
benefits.business_impact: Direct payroll cost savings, improved financial accuracy

benefits.headline: Boost productivity by 35% through better attendance management
benefits.description: Real-time visibility into workforce attendance, automated scheduling, and proactive absence management help minimize disruptions and optimize resource allocation across distributed teams.
proof_points: Businesses suffer 35.5% loss in productivity from unplanned absenteeism
benefits.business_impact: Increased operational efficiency, better resource utilization

benefits.headline: Streamline payroll processing and ensure compliance
benefits.description: Seamlessly integrate accurate time data directly into payroll systems with automated overtime calculations and labor law compliance. Eliminate manual data entry and reduce payroll errors.
proof_points: Complying with labour laws and controlling overtime costs are two of the biggest benefits
benefits.business_impact: Reduced administrative overhead, compliance risk mitigation

benefits.headline: Manage distributed workforce across 1,000+ locations effortlessly
benefits.description: Cloud-based platform with mobile apps, geo-fencing, and location tracking enables seamless management of remote, on-site, and mobile employees from a single dashboard.
benefits.business_impact: Scalable workforce management, reduced operational complexity

benefits.headline: Reduce administrative burden with automated workforce management
benefits.description: Eliminate manual timesheets, automate leave approvals, and streamline scheduling processes. Self-service capabilities let employees manage their own data while providing managers real-time insights.
proof_points: Rated 4 out of 5 stars by clients
benefits.business_impact: Lower HR administrative costs, improved employee satisfaction

benefits.headline: Scale flexibly with pay-as-you-go cloud solution
benefits.description: Cloud-based deployment requires no infrastructure investment. Flexible pricing allows you to scale up or down based on workforce size and seasonal demands without capital expenditure.
proof_points: Get on-cloud without additional investments to your infrastructure
benefits.business_impact: Reduced total cost of ownership, improved cash flow

benefits.headline: Ensure workplace safety with contactless biometric technology
benefits.description: Advanced facial recognition with mask detection, temperature screening, and thermal scanning capabilities maintain hygiene protocols while ensuring accurate attendance tracking.
proof_points: Advanced biometric capabilities including mask detection and temperature detection
benefits.business_impact: Enhanced workplace safety, reduced health risks

benefits.headline: Get real-time workforce insights with comprehensive analytics
benefits.description: Customizable dashboards and reports provide instant visibility into labor costs, attendance patterns, and productivity metrics. Make data-driven decisions to optimize workforce performance.
proof_points: Track attendance on a real time basis and easy to extract reports
Uncover insights into labor costs and spot irregularities
